React! Multiplayer Game https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id= Share this app with your friends! Quick Play Custom Game Shop SHOP Rate this App CHOOSE DIFFICULTY EASY MEDIUM HARD INSANE NO. OF PLAYERS Edit Names START PLAYERS\' PROFILES PLAYER 1 PLAYER 2 PLAYER 3 PLAYER 4 Player One Player Two Player Three Player Four TAG: DONE CANCEL Cancel Custom Name Note: Tag is the color of the Player\'s Button Reset Insane Mode is only available on Purchase. Purchase Insane Mode Now? Go to Shop CUSTOM GAME Select Game Modes Select All Select None Randomize Order Select at least 1 Game Mode! Unable to start Custom Game. Select your Game Modes again. Restore your purchase Remove Ads INSANE Mode No More Ads! Find out more Buy Now! Sold Out! Successfully Purchased! Successfully Restored! An error occurred. Please try again later. Unable to fetch price. Please check your internet connection. Unable to connect to Google Play Store. Please check your connection and try again. Your current Google Play Store account has no purchases. Settings Game Play Settings Score per Correct Answer Score per Wrong Answer Current: Rounds per Game (Only applies to Quick Play) Call next Game Round Call next round after… How long before next Game Round is called correct answer correct answers Answer Delay Time How long the answers are flashed after a player pressed on the button React! Developer\'s Letter Message from the Developer Policy Privacy Policy and Parents Guide Help us Translate! Translate this app to other languages Send us Feedback We would love to hear from you! About FAQ Frequently Asked Questions Credits The contributors for this app Version sec Contact Us Send email via Is this game available on iOS? This game is currently only available on Android. We have no plan for an iOS release yet. How long do I have access to the Remove Ads and Insane Mode features if I were to purchase them? You will have a lifetime access. As the purchase transaction is handled by Google, the purchase is tied to your Google Play account. As long as you use the same Google account, you can click on \"Restore your Purchase\" in the Shop page, and have your previous purchase restored. I have purchased the Remove Ads or Insane Mode feature, but it was not reflected. This can happen if you delete the game and reinstall it, or install it on another device. It may also happen if you manually clear this app\'s data from your phone\'s application setting page. In any case, you can always click on \"Restore your purchase\" and have your previous purchase restored, as long as you are using the same Google account. If this does not work, try to reinstall the app and click on \"Restore your purchase\" again. Is this game available in other languages? This game is currently only available in English. However, we do have plans to localize the game to other languages. Can I increase or decrease the font size in this game? You are not able to increase or decrease the font size directly from the game. However, you can go to your default phone\'s settings page, and increase or decrease the font size there. The font size in this game will then be reflected accordingly. Can I choose what Game Mode to play in Quick Play? For each round, Quick Play randomly choose a Game Mode from all the available Game Modes. You can however choose which Game Mode to play in Custom Game. Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us! Personal Information We do not collect any personal information that could identify you, and hence, we do not disclose any of your personal information. Exception includes when you contact us by email. Please read \'Information you provide\' section below. Cookies We do not use cookies ourselves. Hence, no information on your part is stored by us. However, third party Ads Network may use cookies to deliver interest-based Ads to you. Other Information We use Firebase Analytics by Google, which may collect information that may include, but not limited to, user\'s date of install, frequency of use, functionality of app used, country, etc, for used in the following circumstances:\n\n \t\t 1) To have a better understanding of user\'s demographic\n\n \t\t 2) To better enhance the current product by understanding user\'s origin and functionality of app used\n\n We use Fabric Crashlytics by Google to collect Crash Reports from users when the app crashed. The Crash Report sent to us may include your device model, Android Version, and the part of the code where the crash occurs. No part of this Crash Reports can directly identify an individual personally. Advertisement We show the Ads provided by global network partners such as \'Google Admob\' and \'Facebook Audience Network\'. \n\nThe third party providers may collect information from your part in which we have no control over. Information may include but not limited to your gender, country of origin, age, likes and dislikes etc, so as to serve you more relevant ads. Information you provide If you contact us for support or to give feedback, we may obtain and maintain any information you choose to provide, including your name, email addresses, attachment (if any), contact info as well as information about your mobile devices or other digital devices. We will use this information only to improve our product as well as to address the issue that you mentioned, and not share it with third parties unless required by law. \n\nBy emailing us, you agree that you are above the age of 13 and consent to us storing your email records in our database. In the event you are below the age of 18, you agree that the email you sent to us are vetted and given permission by your legal parent or guardian, and that they understood that email and information you provided may be stored in our database for reference purposes. Parents Guide We require all users who downloaded and use this app to be above the age of 13. This is to be in line with COPPA and policies from third party network such as Facebook Audience Network and Google Admob when serving Ads, as well as Firebase Analytics from Google which may collect information from users. How can I manage or turn off In-app-purchase? This game is free to download and play, but contains two In-app-purchases:\n\n\t\t-Remove Ads\n\t\t-Unlock Insane Mode\n\nThese purchases are never required to play the game, but can be used to enhance the gameplay. In-app-purchase are paid for with real money, and are always labeled as such. You can easily manage the ability to make in-app-purchase, adjust password protection settings, or disable in-app-purchase entirely. To do so, open Google Playstore on your device, and go to \'User controls\' section in the Playstore Settings page. This can prevent your child from making unintentional in-app-purchase. Who processes the In-app-purchase transactions? We do not handle the In-app-purchase transactions. The payment transactions themselves are completed through Google Play via your personal email address associated with that account. Receipts for these transactions are emailed to you by Google.\n\nTherefore, we do not have access to any of your personal and credit card information, as the transaction are completed through Google Play. Need help? We are here to help! You can read through our FAQ page which answers some of the frequently asked questions. For further assistance, you can contact us at contact@ninebitstudio.com. We will be happy to hear from you! feedback@ninebitstudio.com contact@ninebitstudio.com Feedback Contact \nDear React! users\n\nGreetings! It is an honor for us to talk to you through this letter. We would like to share more insights with you and everything you need to know about this app.\n\nThis app was conceived and developed by a few of us from ground up. We have wanted a game that offers a multi-player experience so that we can play with our friends, for giggles. At the same time, the game should also possess beautiful graphics and sound effects for maximum satisfaction. We also wanted a game whereby only 1 device is necessary to play with all our friends locally, without the need for wi-fi or bluetooth connection. As we searched the available multi-player game titles on Playstore, we realized that there are little selections available which meet our criteria. Therefore, we decided to create one ourselves, and make it available to everyone globally. To ensure that users are not able to memorize the quiz of our games and hence having an advantage over their friends, the majority of our Game Modes utilize randomness. This ensures that every possible combinations and permutations are pulled off. Therefore, no players would have a huge advantage by playing this game for a longer time. This makes the game more fair, and in return, more fun. \n\nAs a small team, we are responsible for tackling all the necessary aspects of an app such as code, design, and sounds. In doing so, we created some original content in our studio itself. At the same time, we also utilized beautiful free-for-commercial-use images and sounds that were found online, honoring all their attribution requirements. These attributions can be found inside the \'Credits\' page of this app.\nFor some images and sounds, we acquired the necessary licenses to use them in our app without having to attribute back to the original authors. We take copyright infringement seriously, and in no part of this app do we use resources that infringe upon the rights of their respective holders.\n\nAs we code this app up from scratch, we also utilize several free-to-use libraries from other developers. We would like to take this opportunity to give them a shout out for their wonderful works, which helped to shorten the development time frame for many developers out there.\n\nAs you start to use this app, you might come across errors which forced this app to shut down. Such errors are often unprecedented and we deeply apologized for the inconvenience. We strive to make your experience as pleasant as possible. While we did heavy testing for the app before launching, the heavy fragmentation of Android devices means that it is not feasible for us to test out on every single available Android devices in the market. Hence, some errors might be only native to certain devices and we had not experienced it during our testing phase. However, we assure you that the crash reports that you sent to us will be analyzed in detail and we will fix these potential crashes in subsequent updates.\n\nThe next thing that we would like to talk about is advertisements and in-app-purchase. While we strive to make this app available freely to all our users, advertisements are an essential reason we are able to do so. We have put advertisements only at 3 places, namely the home page, the \'Return to main menu\' pop up, and one full screen ads at the victory page. We aimed to put ads in such a way that it is non-infringing on your game play, and allow our users to have a pleasant experience playing our game. It is important for us to ensure that Ads are only delivered in the most appropriate and engaging way. We understand that some of you may prefer to use the app without Ads. Hence, we have added a feature that allows you to make a one-time purchase which removes the Ads entirely from this app. As the in-app-purchase transaction is handled by Google, which in turn is tied to your Google Account, you are able to enjoy the feature for a lifetime with a single purchase, so long as you used the same Google Account. The \'Insane Mode\' offers a more challenging Game Play, featuring a higher level of difficulty. This mode is particularly targeted at users who want a faster-paced game play, delving into more challenging situations. It is not available for free, and require a one time purchase. We hope that for users who do not wish to spend their hard-earned money on this app, the Easy, Medium, and Hard modes can offer you sufficient joys and satisfaction.\n\nLastly, we would like to thank You, our users, who had downloaded this app and supported us along the way. We hope you have a fun time playing with your friends. If you like our app, do remember to give us a Rate in the Playstore, and recommend it to more of your friends! We thank you for your time in reading this letter! Have fun, and giggle on! :) \n\nFrom your friendly developers at Ninebit Studio End \nThis page serves to provide credits to all the relevant parties who have contributed to this app. Image Credits 1) Ribbon banner: Graphics by: www.Vecteezy.com\n by happymeluv 2)Subtle Patterns Backgrounds: The following images are licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0 from Subtle Patterns, and some changes may have been made to the original images: Stardust - by Atle Mo \nStraws - by Pavel \nNorwegian Rose - by Fredrik Scheideâ€¨ \nWeave - by Catherine \nLined Paper - by Are Sundnes \n3px Tile - by Gre3g \nRavenna - by Sentel \nLow Contrast Linen - by Jordan Pittman \nContemporary China - by Adam Charlts \nRestaurant - by Andrijana Jarnjak \nMoulin - by Venam \nps_neutral - by Gluszczenko \nbrushed_alu - by Tim Ward \nBatthern - by Factorio.us Collective \nInspiration Geometry - by Welsley 3) Background: Background vector created by Freepik Sound Credits \"1 Person Cheering\" Jeff Rifkin

IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. \n \nLink: https://github.com/intuit/sdp \n\n\n\n intuit/ssp \n==================== \n The MIT License (MIT) \n \nCopyright (c) 2013 - 2015 Intuit Inc. \n \nPermission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions: \n \nThe above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. \n \nTHE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. \n \nLink: https://github.com/intuit/ssp About Insane Mode The following describes each Game Mode with Insane Mode selected, and compared it with the Hard Mode. This allows you to make a more informed choice before purchasing the Insane Mode. Hard: Identify 1 animal, 1 sec Timer Insane: Identify 2 animals, 1 sec Timer Hard: Larger Circle Insane: Smaller Circle, faster rotating speed Hard: 512 combinations, 2 sec Timer Insane: 990 combinations, 1 sec Timer Hard: 7 colors Insane: 12 colors, up to 1 sec faster changing speed Hard: 8 stripes Insane: 11 stripes Hard: 1.5 sec Timer Insane: 1 sec Timer Hard: 1–6 sec eclipse completion time Insane: 1–8 sec eclipse completion time Hard: Numbers up to 300 Insane: Numbers up to 1000 Hard: Identify 1 picture Insane: Identify 2 pictures Hard: 1.5 sec Timer Insane: 1 sec Timer Hard: 1.5 sec Timer Insane: 1 sec Timer Hard: 6 gears Insane: 8 gears, rotate 25% faster Hard: Rectangles static in position Insane: Rectangles constantly rotating around Hard: Grid of 5 x 6 Insane: Grid of 6 x 8 Hard: 1.5 sec Timer Insane: 1 sec Timer Hard: Match 1 word Insane: Match 2 words, 21 additional colors Hard: 6 orbs Insane: 8 orbs, up to 50% faster moving speed Hard: 6 arrows, 1.5 sec Timer Insane: 8 arrows, 1 sec Timer, 3 additional Colors Hard: Grid of 5 x 6 Insane: Grid of 6 x 8 Hard: Number up to 270, move only Insane: Number up to 999, move and rotate Hard: 2 faces Insane: 4 faces, up to 25% faster changing speed Hard: move only Insane: move and rotate Hard: starting number is an integer only Insane: starting number includes decimal Hard: Grid of 5 x 6 Insane: Grid of 6 x 8 How to play Select either Quick Play or Custom Game Select a Level Difficulty and Number of Players currently playing Optionally change the Player\'s name and Color tag 1) This is the game content\n2) This is the current Question\n3) This is your current Score \n4) This is the button for Player Two to tap\n5) This is the button for Player One to tap Objective: Test your reaction skill with your friends by tapping only when the question is correct! \n\nGet as many points as possible to win! Challenge your friends today! Player One Player Two Player Three Player Four Tap when the equation is Correct SPAM! Tap as many times as possible! Tap when both circles collide! Tap when there are at least unique colors Tap if the resultant color is correct! Correct Answer Number is Odd and Letter is Vowel? Tap when Color matches the Name! Tap when both Colors match the Names! Tap when the Animal\'s name is correct Both the Animals\' names are correct? Tap when the Language is correct Tap if the Conversion is correct Both Rectangles Are Equal In Size? Tap when there is a Full Eclipse All Arrows Point In Different Directions? Tap when you see the letter \'N\' The Country matches the Continent? Tap when the Food is correct Tap when both Food are correct Tap when you see a Smiling Face Tap when there are 2 Smiling Faces Tap when there are 4 Smiling Faces Tap when there are more \'O\' than \'X\' Does The Shapes Match Perfectly? Is there a Multi-colored Orb? All 3 circles are equal in size? All the Gears turn in same Direction? Tap when there are at least 5 yellow circles Tap when the screen turns White! Tap when the screen turns Yellow! Tap when the screen turns Cyan! Tap when the screen turns Green! Tap when the screen turns Blue! Tap when the screen turns Black! Tap when the screen turns Red! Tap when the screen turns Purple! Tap when the screen turns Pink! Tap when the screen turns Orange! Tap when the screen turns Maroon! Tap when the screen turns Gray! DRAW! Round Game Completed! of Return to Main Menu? Return to Main Menu Restart Quick Play Restart Custom Game Yes No Go to next round WINNER! Animal Kingdom! Colliding Circle! Color Mixer! Colored Screen! Color Stripes! Country & Continent Eclipse! Equation Battle! Food Paradise! Identifying Languages! Illusion: Circle Illusion: Gears! Illusion: Rectangle M and N Match the Shapes! Matching Colors! Multi-Colored Orbs! Neon Arrows O more than X Odd and Vowel! Smiling Faces :) Spam Taps! Unit Conversion! Five Yellow Circles
